nodes.text: The father of Bertroff Hissa, a Grand Moff of the Galactic Empire, was a male of the Human species. He and his wife were former political agitators who had relocated on the uncharted planet of PL-40112-CE-021105 in search of a "simple and natural" lifestyle. He died during a conflict that opposed the inhabitants of his new homeworld and the Imperials against the Rozzum.
